markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=149)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Spirits are ephemeral creatures defined by their spiritual self and often lacking a physical form.
name: Spirit
